instruction: Describe the personality of a person who enjoys playing sports.
output: A person who enjoys playing sports typically has an outgoing and upbeat personality. They are competitive and determined, often pushing to be their best at the game. They strive to be the best and take great pride in the successes they achieve, whether it be winning a game or simply beating their own personal record. These individuals are passionate, both for the game and for their team, and are willing to work hard and sacrifice for what they believe in. They also display leadership qualities and are naturally driven to both compete and collaborate with their peers.
